body:
Comment 1: 
You've got 80 goroutines now, but did you have many more goroutines at some earlier
point?  Do you kick off 
many goroutines sometimes to get a lot of work done and then back off?  Maybe if the
network stops responding 
you get a temporary increase in goroutines?

30MB at 5k per goroutine is 6000 goroutines.
